title: Discover Hong Kong·City Walks
creator: Hong Kong Tourism Board 香港旅遊發展局

extendedInfo.description: Discover Hong Kongâ§City Walks, with AR (Augmented Reality) function, lets you explore all of the nooks and crannies of Asia's world city. The app guides you on four themed walks on which youâll encounter the city's vibrant living culture and enjoy the east-meet-west diversity of Hong Kong. The appâs AR function will reveal the featured restaurants, shops, MTR entrances/exits and Wi-Fi hotspots on the walks.The four walks are:â¢	Adventure in Architecture - Central & Western Districtâ¢	Travel Through Time - Garden Road Leisure Walkâ¢	Savour the Cosmopolitan Flavours - Tsim Sha Tsuiâ¢	Experience Living Culture - Yau Ma Tei & Mong KokFeatures include:â¢	'Locate Me' â find your location on the mapâ¢	Audio commentaries on attractions â¢	Alert messages and vibration when near an attraction.â¢	Souvenir stamp upon completion of the walkâ¢	Share your travel experience and souvenir stamps with your friends via e-mail, Facebook and RenRen. * Support smartphones running Android 1.6 or above with screen resolutions of 480x800 and 720x1280. Optimized device: Samsung Galaxy Note.#Continuous use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Can only see main screen. After that, none of the links work.
reviews.author: Vanessa Seng

reviews.title: Does not function
reviews.comment: Does not function on my Samsung Galaxy S4 GT-I9505
reviews.author: Peter Siddall

reviews.title: Can be better
reviews.comment: Info is ok but doesn\'t work with my phone\'s GPS. Unable to determine my location on the map.
reviews.author: YenChen Ang

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on my RAZR Maxx.  Works fine on my wife\'s iPhone.
reviews.author: Leonard Voo

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I paid a lot of money for my phone and it deserves better than to have this thing installed on it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: This app is amazingly useful and beautiful. I can recommend it to anyone who visits Hong Kong.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great apps~~
reviews.comment: It is a great app. to show Hong Kong fantastic places~~
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: seems like good content, but home screen broken
reviews.comment: I have a Samsung Galaxy S III, one of the newest phones on the market. The home screen doesn\'t work. I tap on various places on the screen, and sometimes it takes me to one of the walks, but most of the time it does nothing. Even when it works, I have no idea which one will be opened. So the content looks great, and I\'d love to use it, but it\'s unusable on my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awkward, hard to use app
reviews.comment: So much so that I don\'t bother using it.
reviews.author: Kartick Vaddadi

reviews.title: Buggy app
reviews.comment: Don\'t know buggy or what, the app is very laggy to to touch response. Compatible with ics?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Error 498
reviews.comment: Unable to download due to error 498
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Hong Kong is the only one which releases this kind of amazing apps for travelling. It helps me a lots.
reviews.author: Doris Ng

reviews.title: Very basic
reviews.comment: Whole app is a dozen paragraphs of text
reviews.author: James Tong
